Cherrycake\Items::clearCache

Clears the cache for the query represented by the given $p parameters, just as they were passed to buildCacheKeyNamingOptions (most probably passed first to fillFromParameters)

    Signature

    public function clearCache([boolean $p = false] )

    Parameters

    $p — boolean
    A hash array of parameters that will be used to build the cache key to clear, so it has to be the same as the parameters passed to buildCacheKeyNamingOptions (and also to fillFromParameters, and to the constructor, if that's the case)

    Returns

    boolean
    True if the cache could be cleared, false otherwise
